name: Welcome To Town
description:
Heya newcomer. 

This little village, which used to be really quiet,  is shaken up when everybody’s favourite hobo, Harry, dies. It is up to you to find out who the murderer is. Is it the lovely Katy? Crazy Steve? Jock Michael? Or the scientist Eugene? Someone must pay for this. And you can decide who that will be. Will you find out the truth? Or will all these helpless villagers have to rely on themselves? Good luck!
